d:
PLEASE READ:
If you feel like something is missing, that's because this is ongoing
From pages 1-16 is the main story (ongoing)
From pages 15-40 is the wife's pov, set in the future
From pages 41-50 is a what if kind of story where the brother is not around and they live with Bob
From page 51 onward I divided the pages except the colored ones, those look wierd if split
Not so friendly reminder that this is not a story about an out of character Tatsumaki, is about a
wife that looks like her
*25/01/2026 Update: 3 Page main story, 3 pages Diary, 1 page Bob
Go show some love to the artist if you can:
https://ayanami00menasu7.fanbox.cc/
